products.title: Metallic 25mm Rose Gold T7345 Neat Fit Aluminium Venetian Blind
products.description: Their metallic venetians add a a natural flare to your home. In several metal-like hues, these blinds would look great in modern or rustic settings. Rose gold is a shade that continues to dominate the decor, clothing and accessories markets. A trending colour for several years and a great, softer alternative to copper. This blind would look great with some lush green plants to enhance your window.

products.title: Bella Blackout Solar Yellow Panel Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This bright sunny yellow panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panelblind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash solar yellow electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold yellow roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm saturated shade. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.

products.title: Boheme Pvc Blackout Summer Yellow Electric Roller Blind

Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety.
